messages.content: You're a helpful, intelligent sales assistant.

We're an operations agency that builds outreach systems, CRM systems, project management systems, no-code systems, and integrations.

Below is a loose scope. Turn that scope into a high-quality proposal in JSON. 

Our clients are enterprise, so write in a spartan, no-frills tone that implies intelligence.

{"businessDescription":"Flatiron Search Partners is an executive recruiting firm that specializes in high end technology clients.", "problem":"Right now they're managing all of their leads & projects in a massive Google Sheet. The key issues: their system is disorganized, incapable of scaling, and provides little in the way of accountability. Team members are manually updating fields, copying and pasting data, and there is no single source of truth.","solution": "Migration to a dedicated CRM & project management solution like Monday.com, and a bespoke setup that includes a CRM board to handle new leads, alongside a PM board to handle new and ongoing projects. The creation of new records, and various administrative tasks alongside them, will be handled using both built in Monday automations and third party tools. I'll also create a process library of SOPs to improve operations more generally.", "tools":"Monday.com: CRM/PM platform. Make.com: third party automation tool. Typeform: data entry with good user experience."}

{"problemPitch":"1. You're using systems that don't scale

Currently, your team spends a ridiculous amount of time manually updating fields in a Google Sheet. This is resource-intensive, inefficient, and tedious—it's easy for a small mistake to cascade into a large one, and this has happened multiple times. Perhaps more importantly, there's no accountability, so when said problems inevitably arise, it's impossible to trace it back to its root and solve it.

2. You're doing (and paying) too much

Google Sheets is free. But the impact on your business has been costly. Given the archaic nature of your current setup, specific daily tasks are difficult to operationalize—leading to a large chunk of your employee/contractor costs going to admin tasks that are easily automatable.

3. You're missing a ton of functionality

Google Sheets is primarily textual, and misses the rich functionality afforded by more intentional CRMs. For instance, you can't assign owners to records, or automatically notify team members when something needs to happen (instead, everyone has to be online all the time "just in case"), or take advantage of more effective views to represent data flow.", "solutionPitch:"1. First, I'll migrate & build you a scalable system:

I'll help you migrate to Monday.com, a dedicated CRM and project management platform. This will address many of the scalability issues inherent to Google Sheets—your team will be able to assign owners to records, receive notifications on important tasks, and communicate with eachother in a public, accountable way. 

In addition, I'll build bespoke automations (both in Monday and using a third party tool, Make.com) to eliminate the need for manual record creation and related administrative functions. This will improve cycle time, better the quality of life of your staff, and decrease the likelihood of a costly error.

2. Then, I'll help you improve cost efficiency:

Next, we'll operationalize your procedures, add them to a library of SOPs, and begin scoping automated solutions to improve the effectiveness of each task. Much of the knowledge in your company currently exists in conversation or hidden direct messages and threads—turning this into a central, accessible knowledge base will streamline new hire onboarding, significantly improve margins on tasks, and make your team much more flexible.", "title":"Streamlining Flatiron Search Partners & Migrating to Monday", "platformList":"Monday.com, Make.com, Typeform"}

{"businessDescription":"Memphis Home Buyers is a residential real estate company that buys (and then flips) homes with recorded payment troubles in the Memphis area.", "problem":"They have a list of over 50K contacts with homes they could be pitching to but they're not reaching out at all. A simple email campaign would suffice, but all they're doing is calling, and although calling yields higher conversion rates than emails, it's also much more time and resource-intensive. They're generating a small fraction of the revenue they could have been if they ran an omnichannel campaign and used email to qualify. Very underoptimized.","solution": "Using a dedicated cold email tool like Instantly to manage a thousand or more outbound emails per day, along with a standardized set of operating procedures for a salesperson to qualify over email. If the lead is qualified, they'll be passed over to their closing team, which will give the lead a call and make a purchase offer within 24hrs. This will multiply their earnings.", "tools":"Instantly.ai: cold email tool. Make.com: third party automation tool."}

{"problemPitch":"1. Your current outreach system doesn't scale

Right now, your team is manually cold-calling each lead in your database. This is time-intensive (it takes perhaps ten to twenty seconds, minimum, to reach out to each lead) and costly (because you're paying your salespeople per hour to drive you results). While it does work occasionally, this is not a scalable system. A better one would involve omnichannel communication, automatic qualification, and much faster outreach.", "solutionPitch:"1. First, I'll migrate you to Instantly.ai, a high-volume cold email tool

I'll migrate all of your contacts to Instantly.ai, the best performing cold email tool on the market. We'll use a cold email campaign to qualify each lead, and make an offer so good that most of your prospects can't help but respond to (i.e we're willing to send them an all-cash offer within 24hrs).

2. Then, I'll build you a set of standard operating sales procedures

By tiering your outreach system into two steps—email first, and then a call—we'll significantly improve efficiency and total revenue. As you scale, you'll need a centralized set of documents and operating procedures to let you hire new email staff (setters) and phone operators (closers)—so I'll build one for you. This will let anybody in your team swap roles as needed, and drastically reduce onboarding time, which will be sufficient infrastructure to scale past 7-figures into 10M/yr and beyond.", "title":"Scalable Omnichannel Sales System for Memphis Home Buyers", "platformList":"Instantly.ai, Make.com"}

{"businessDescription":"{{91.fields.`Business Description`}}", "problem":"{{91.fields.Problem}}", "solution":"{{91.fields.Solution}} and additional notes : {{91.fieldsById.question_5jA6pE}}", "tools":"{{91.fields.`Platforms to use`}}"}

messages.content: You're a helpful, intelligent writing assistant.

Write 4 sophisticated-sounding milestones & associated timelines for a project proposal. Use the provided solution statement and rough timetable and the following JSON format.

{"milestone-1":"milestone 1 description",
"timeline-1" : "timeline 1 description",
"milestone-2":"milestone 2 description",
"timeline-2" : "timeline 2 description",
"milestone-3":"milestone 3 description",
"timeline-3" : "timeline 3 description",
"milestone-4":"milestone 4 description",
"timeline-4" : "timeline 4 description"}

{"milestone-1":"MVP & Outreach Process Flow",
"timeline-1" : "7-10 days",
"milestone-2":"Platform Set Up (Airtable, Outreach, GPT-4)",
"timeline-2" : "5 days",
"milestone-3":"Testing & Iteration",
"timeline-3" : "3 days",
"milestone-4":"Process Documentation",
"timeline-4" : "1 day"}

mapper.html:
Hello {{91.fields.`First Name`}},

Please find attached your personalized proposal for {{91.fields.Company}}.

As a thank-you for considering us, we're excited to offer you a 10% discount if you confirm your project within the next 7 days. It’s our way of helping you get started with even more value.

If you have any questions or would like to schedule a call to walk through the proposal, feel free to reach out at any time.

Best regards,
Abhiram
CEO & Founder - Prime Ad Agency

This proposal is confidential and intended solely for {{91.fields.Company}}. Offer valid for 7 days from receipt.
mapper.subject: Proposal for {{91.fields.`First Name`}} {{91.fields.`Last Name`}} - {{91.fields.Company}}
